https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/xbFQSERYwRUWrzqBm9f2cBwZFF6.jpg Namiko Morita, who lived in Otaru, moved to this area with her husband, Yutaro, and opened the brewery "Morita Brewery". Eventually, they succeeded in this business and lived happily while raising three children. However, in August 1945, the situation changed completely due to the Soviet invasion of Manchuria. Akai Tsuki
